DelegatingAssembly derives from Assembly and implements most of the properties and methods of Assembly . For each member it implements, DelegatingAssembly automatically delegates to the corresponding member of the internal Assembly object which was supplied as the argument to the constructor. This internal Assembly is exposed to deriving classes by the langword_csharp_protected m_assemblyImpl field. Constructors | Improve this Doc View Source DelegatingAssembly(Assembly) Constructor. DelegatingConstructorInfo Wraps a ConstructorInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that ConstructorInfo . DelegatingEventInfo Wraps a EventInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that EventInfo . DelegatingFieldInfo Wraps a FieldInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that FieldInfo . DelegatingMethodInfo Wraps a MethodInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that MethodInfo . DelegatingParameterInfo Wraps a ParameterInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that ParameterInfo . DelegatingPropertyInfo Wraps a PropertyInfo instance and delegates all method calls to that PropertyInfo . DelegatingType Wraps a Type and delegates all methods to that Type. MemberInfoExtensions Defines useful extension methods, used for reflection. Reflect Defines methods to get reflection information based on lambda expressions. override only those members you have to provide customization in. DelegatingConstructorInfo derives from ConstructorInfo and implements most of the properties and methods of ConstructorInfo . For each member it implements, DelegatingConstructorInfo automatically delegates to the corresponding member of the internal ConstructorInfo object which was supplied as the argument to the constructor. This internal ConstructorInfo is exposed to deriving classes by the langword_csharp_protected Alphaleonis.Reflection.DelegatingConstructorInfo.m_constructorImpl field. api/Alphaleonis.Reflection.Context.Custo.title: Class CustomReflectionContextBase | Alphaleonis.Reflection
api/Alphaleonis.Reflection.Context.Custo.keywords: Class CustomReflectionContextBase Represents a customizable reflection context. Inheritance Object ReflectionContext CustomReflectionContextBase TableReflectionContext Inherited Members ReflectionContext.GetTypeForObject(Object) Object.ToString() Object.Equals(Object) Object.Equals(Object, Object) Object.ReferenceEquals(Object, Object) Object.GetHashCode() Object.GetType() Object.MemberwiseClone() Namespace : Alphaleonis.Reflection.Context Assembly : Alphaleonis.Reflection.dll Syntax public abstract class CustomReflectionContextBase : ReflectionContext Remarks CustomReflectionContextBase provides a way to add or remove custom attributes from reflection objects, or add dummy properties to those objects, without re-implementing the complete reflection model. This class has many similarities to System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext , but it does have a few differences; It prevents a type being mapped multiple times, which may cause problems in many scenarios. This is done by adding a CustomReflectionContextIdAttribute with a unique ID for each reflection context in which the type or member is mapped. If a member that has this attribute with the same ID as the reflection context is sent to a Map method, it will simply be returned as is. It provides access to the projectors used to wrap each type or member, and allows specific overriding of only those in which you are interested. Also, the projectors by default delegate all methods to their base class, while the ones in System.Reflection.Contxet throws a NotImplementedException for many methods (at the time of writing). No convenience methods for adding additional properties to an object is currently provided by this class as is the case with the implementation in System.Reflection.Context . Declaration protected bool IsMapped(ICustomAttributeProvider member) Parameters Type Name Description ICustomAttributeProvider member The member to examine. Returns Type Description Boolean true if the member has been mapped in this reflection context, or false otherwise. Remarks This works by examining if the member has been decorated with the CustomReflectionContextIdAttribute with the Id of this reflection context, so it will work even if the member was mapped in other reflection contexts after being mapped in this. | Improve this Doc View Source MapAssembly(Assembly) Gets the representation, in this reflection context, of an assembly that is represented by an object from another reflection context.
